net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp
Class RtpSocket

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp.RtpSocket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RtpSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A basic implementation of an RTP socket. It implements a buffering mechanism, relying on a FIFO of buffers and a Thread. That way, if a packetizer tries to send many packets too quickly, the FIFO will grow and packets will be sent one by one smoothly.

          Computes the proper rate at which packets are sent.
